com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream

Interface DataSink

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteArrayDataSink, CacheDataSink

    public interface DataSink
    A component that consumes media data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the DataSink.
      DataSink open(DataSpec dataSpec)
      Opens the DataSink to consume the specified data.
      void write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int length)
      Consumes the provided data.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        DataSink open(DataSpec dataSpec)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the DataSink to consume the specified data. Calls to open(DataSpec) and close() must be balanced.
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be consumed.
        Returns:
        This DataSink, for convenience.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        void close()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the DataSink.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • write

        void write(byte[] buffer,
           int offset,
           int length)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Consumes the provided data.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer from which data should be consumed.
        offset - The offset of the data to consume in buffer.
        length - The length of the data to consume, in bytes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
